think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the 'effective_cache_size' knob in PostgreSQL. 2. Determine if it has a special value that alters its behavior significantly. 3. Check the documentation for PostgreSQL to see if -1 or 0 are considered special values for this knob. 4. Conclude whether it behaves as a regular numerical knob or as a special knob based on the findings.
